backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing user profiles, rate card uploads, booking lead creation, and permission‑guarded access using AccessControl and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode overrides, and global styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling routing, deep-links, mode‑based redirects, actor initialization, and error states.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Application shell with header, navigation, share dialog, and mode‑aware visibility for leads and profile options.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Simple logo component rendering square or wide brand images from static assets.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a styled fallback UI with reload and support contact options.
frontend/src/components/OwnerNotAuthoriz: Displays an authorization error card showing the user's principal ID with copy support and optional navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/RatePricingSecti: Renders pricing tables and notes for vehicle rates, hourly rates, local transfers, rentals, and additional trip info.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCard: Provides customer and owner shareable app links with copy and open actions in a styled card.
frontend/src/components/TripTotalCalcula: Interactive calculator that computes trip cost based on vehicle type, trip type, distance, and driver allowance.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Displays the current user's avatar or fallback icon using profile data from a query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Enhanced actor hook that handles authenticated/anonymous actors, optional admin initialization, and reports errors and warnings.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: A React hook that syncs state with localStorage safely in SSR environments.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom React Query hooks for backend actor calls including leads, admin checks, rate card operations, and user profile actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark mode theme variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BookingFormPage.tsx: A form page for creating booking leads with validation, submission handling, and success alerts.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Displays booking leads with polling, admin/authorization checks, localStorage settings, and optional notification sounds.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page managing Internet Identity auth, app mode routing, and navigation buttons for booking, leads, rate card, and profile.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page allowing users to initialize a profile and upload a display picture with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/RateCardPage.tsx: Rate card page enabling authenticated users to view pricing, download the latest rate card, and admins to upload new files.
frontend/src/utils/appMode.ts: Utilities for reading and persisting the app’s customer/owner mode from URL or session storage.
frontend/src/utils/canonicalUrl.ts: Generates shareable canonical URLs with optional mode and deep-link parameters and supports copying them to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Creates a blob URL to trigger client‑side file downloads.
frontend/src/utils/mapBackendError.ts: Maps backend error messages to user‑friendly strings for display while preserving raw error details.
frontend/src/utils/rates.ts: Defines vehicle rate constants and helper functions for per‑km, hourly, and allowance calculations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and managing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Project state file defining metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for customer booking link behavior.
